high_descs: turn right walk along go to the  desk
take  the pot in  the dining table
Turn right to reach the desk.
Pick up the pot from the desk.
Turn left to reach the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pot under the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and go straight, turn right and take a left towards the desk
Pick up pot from the desk
Turn left and go straight, turn right towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a pot by the light of a desk lamp
